children.subject:
Different Anon, but also want to change a class to PNP. When I tried to edit it, I received this message:

Error: Unable to complete your request. You do not have access to perform this transaction at this time.
The grading option change deadline has passed, so I think you need to see an advisor to do this
^ Grading option deadline has not passed for L&S, are you referring to CoE?

You don't submit a form to pnp in general. You do it online. Go to Calcentral, then go to My Academics. From there, on the right side there should be a Class Enrollment section and down should say Class Adjustment and then a Change Grading Option.

history.content:
You got until 11/1 to change grading options for not required classes or if you're L&S. Too late for tech ones that satisfy requirements in CoE:

https://engineering.berkeley.edu/passednot-passed-pnp-grading-option

https://ls.berkeley.edu/advising/academic-progress/grades/passednot-passed-grades

No need to submit a form for changing the option the normal way. If you do still wanna pass no pass a course past this deadline, there are two routes. For both, you need to talk to an advisor asap. One is excused (things like medical/dsp related), while the other is a no-questions-asked schedule change. The issue with the latter is you only get one for your time here at Berkeley, so choose wisely. I believe the deadline for these is either last friday of classes or last friday of deadweek, but let's be honest, if you don't reach out to your advisor now you'll prob forget, and no one wants that blow to their GPA
What are general process of P/NP procedure in general? How many days in advance do we need to submit form and where do we need to submit the forms?
history.subject: P/NP
